3: The hall continues to shake, causing countless debris to fall.
Didn't think you'd be stupid enough to ignore me!
Is that what you think... Did you not notice that my target was you from the start?
Roland swings his weapon, destroying all the pillars in the hall.
Huge stones fall between Gray Raven and Roland, blocking the team's movements and vision.
We're not going to leave you!
Kamui! I noticed your corruption level is rising rapidly!
